ActorTalk: Commandant was talking about the public navigation point in Sequence Square.
Do you really think there's something here that can help us break the loop?
Dreamweaverâ€”a special device jointly developed by the WGAA and the Science Council.
It takes keywords entered by the user and combines them with brainwave data to simulate the user's ideal world through digital modeling.
Oh! This is the one the staff member mentioned earlier.
It can read keywords and create a world based on the user's wishes.
It sounds like it was made exactly for this kind of wish.
Commandant [PlayerName] and Captain Lucia of Gray Raven! Welcome! Are you interested in trying out our Dreamweaver device?
The device hasn't officially launched yet, but if you'd like, you can fill out a reservation form and we'll notify you as soon as it's ready.
Is there any way we could request early access? Please, this is very important to us.
Well, since it's the two of you... I'll see what I can do.
Thank you. We appreciate it.
Good news. The developers have agreed to let you try it early, as long as you're willing to authorize the use of your session data to help optimize the system.
No issues on my side.
Then I'll need you both to sign this authorization form and a non-disclosure agreement.
Before the system is released publicly, all related data must remain confidential. We ask that you run your test in a private setting.
Understood. We've signed both forms.
Thank you for your cooperation. I'll bring you the device and set up your access right away.
We've got the Dreamweaver. Now for the private setting... Commandant? Do you have any ideas?
Right, no time to waste. Let's go.
I noticed this device here earlier.
We'd really appreciate your help making that happen.
I'm fine with that. What about you, Lucia?
All things considered, our lounge is probably the best choice.
